posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
What would you make with this subrace?

Mountain Dwarf
 
    Syntax: Dwarf-mountain
    Stats: +2 Strength, +4 Constitution, -2 Charisma
    Feats: Exotic Weapon Proficiency, Weapon Specialization: Dwarven Waraxe
    Special Ability: Avalanche (Earthquake): 3 times a day the mountain dwarf can cast a special Earthquake at their character level. I.e. a 60th level Mountain Dwarf will cast a 60th level Earthquake.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: My thoughts are either Fighter / Bard / RDD to add even more to those ability bonuses, or Fighter / Rogue / DD to become a real Dwarf's Dwarf.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content: On the same theme, Hip Maestro posted GDL's Hearth Guard (Fighter 8/ CoT 10/ DwD 22) in the Full Epic sub-forum here (it's on the first page). Within it, there's a link  to a version I made (with much help from others) to update the build to be 1.69 compliant, get rid of some less useful feats and give proficiencies in 2 weapon types. It's also and EDR 3 build, so might be worth a look.
